page.title: 12Life Styles
page.content: Northampton does not have its own specific fashion trends, but follows that of other major towns and cities. There are a number of different rival groups of which Casuals hold the majority. The rest of the minority are groups like Punks, Greabos,Mods, and Rockabillies. White jackets, Summer boots, any pastel colours,and hats, are just some of the present trends. But fashion is always changing from month to month. Music is also something that varies a great deal. There is a Northampton based group called "The Jets"who base their music around rock and roll,and have made themselves known in the British Pop Charts.
